personalInfo.title: AI Engineer & Data Scientist
personalInfo.summary: Innovative AI/NLP Engineer and Data Scientist with extensive hands-on experience in designing, optimizing, and deploying cutting-edge generative AI and machine learning solutions. Known for reducing customer support response times by 40% through the development of LangChain-powered AI agents and achieving 92% accuracy in sentiment classification using DistilBERT pipelines.

recentAchievements: Reduced customer support response times by 40% with LangChain AI agents
Achieved 92% accuracy in sentiment classification using DistilBERT
